channel.title: The Grace of Our Lord Jesus Christ

item.title: What does the lord require of thee?
item.dc:creator: thegraceofourlord
item.description: What doth the Lord thy God require of thee, but to fear the Lord thy God, to walk in all his ways, and to love him, and to serve the Lord thy God with all thy heart and with all thy soul, To keep the commandments of the Lord, and his statutes, which I command […]
item.content:encoded: What doth the Lord thy God require of thee, but to fear the Lord thy God, to walk in all his ways, and to love him, and to serve the Lord thy God with all thy heart and with all thy soul, To keep the commandments of the Lord, and his statutes, which I command thee this day for thy good? Deuteronomy 10:12â€“22 (KJV 1900)
